1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | String utility.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Text.Utility
6  ( -- * Trim
7    trimBegin, trimEnd, trimBoth,
8    -- * Padding
9    padBegin, padEnd, 
10    padBeginWith, padEndWith,
11    stringWidth,
12    addSpace,
13    -- * Put
14    putShow, putShowLn,
15    putLines, hPutLines, hPutEmptyLine,
16  ) where
17
18import qualified Data.Char                      as Ch
19import qualified System.IO                      as IO
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Type  as O
21
22
23-- ----------------------  Trim
24
25isSpace :: Char -> Bool
26isSpace c = Ch.isSpace c    -- UnicodeSeprator | UnicodeOther
27
28-- | Remove space and space-like characters from the beginning of string.
29--
30--   >>> trimBegin "  abc  "
31--   "abc  "
32--
33trimBegin :: O.StringMap
34trimBegin = dropWhile isSpace
35
36-- | Remove space and space-like characters from the end of string.
37--
38--   >>> trimEnd "  abc  "
39--   "  abc"
40--
41trimEnd :: O.StringMap
42trimEnd [] = []
43trimEnd (x : xs) =
44    case x : trimEnd xs of
45      [y] | isSpace y -> []
46      ys -> ys
47
48-- | Remove space and space-like characters
49--   from the beginning and end of string.
50--
51--   >>> trimBoth "  abc  "
52--   "abc"
53--
54trimBoth :: O.StringMap
55trimBoth = trimEnd . trimBegin
56
57
58-- ----------------------  Padding
59
60-- | Add spaces to the left.
61--
62--   >>> padBegin 10 "abc"
63--   "       abc"
64--
65padBegin :: Int -> O.StringMap
66padBegin = padBeginWith ' '
67
68-- | Add spaces to the right.
69--
70--   >>> padEnd 10 "abc"
71--   "abc       "
72--
73padEnd :: Int -> O.StringMap
74padEnd = padEndWith ' '
75
76-- | Add given character to the left.
77--
78--   >>> padBeginWith '.' 10 "abc"
79--   ".......abc"
80--
81padBeginWith :: Char -> Int -> O.StringMap
82padBeginWith p n s = replicate rest p ++ s where
83    rest = max 0 (n - stringWidth s)
84
85-- | Add given character to the right.
86padEndWith :: Char -> Int -> O.StringMap
87padEndWith p n s = s ++ replicate rest p where
88    rest = max 0 (n - stringWidth s)
89
90-- | Calculate width of string.
91stringWidth :: String -> Int
92stringWidth = sum . map charWidth
93
94-- | Character width.
95charWidth :: Char -> Int
96charWidth c
97    | Ch.ord c >= 256  = 2
98    | otherwise        = 1
99
100-- | Add space character if first character is non-space.
101--
102--   >>> addSpace "aaa"
103--   " aaa"
104--
105--   >>> addSpace " bbb"
106--   " bbb"
107--
108--   >>> addSpace ""
109--   ""
110--
111addSpace :: O.StringMap
112addSpace cs@(c : _) | Ch.isSpace c  = cs
113                    | otherwise     = ' ' : cs
114addSpace ""                         = ""
115
116
117-- ----------------------  Put
118
119-- | Print showing value.
120putShow :: (Show a) => a -> IO ()
121putShow = putStr . show
122
123-- | Print showing value with newline.
124putShowLn :: (Show a) => a -> IO ()
125putShowLn = putStrLn . show
126
127-- | Print multiple lines.
128putLines :: [String] -> IO ()
129putLines = putStr . unlines
130
131-- | Print multiple lines.
132hPutLines :: IO.Handle -> [String] -> IO ()
133hPutLines h = (IO.hPutStrLn h `mapM_`)
134
135-- | Print empty line.
136hPutEmptyLine :: IO.Handle -> IO ()
137hPutEmptyLine h = IO.hPutStrLn h ""
